title: OpenType Support in Vista at the system level?
content:
I just came across [a website](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205012248/http:/scholarsfonts.net/cardofnt.html "From the Cardo font website") that claims that “Longhorn will support OT features at the system level.” Can anyone confirm or deny this?
